titleStmt.title: The history of Quintus Curcius conteyning the actes of the greate Alexander translated out of Latine into Englishe by Iohn Brende.
Historia Alexandri Magni. English
titleStmt.author: Curtius Rufus, Quintus.
Brende, John.

notesStmt.note: Translation of Curtius Rufus' "Historia Alexandri Magni".
Printed as pages, numbered as leaves.

Colophon reads: Imprynted at London by Richarde Tottell, dwellynge in Fletestrete at the signe of the hande and starre, within Temple barre. Anno domini 1553. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum per septennium.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
